channel.title: Why won't portals work on dodian?

item.title: Why won't portals work on dodian?
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

Ok dodian is the worst souce but still I love it.

Anyways none of the portals want to work! It says Use Portal but guess what… Nothing happens.

Here is my globaobj code:

 	makeGlobalObject(3237, 9312, 7318, -3, 10);//Portal in shop code

Here is my portal code:

if (objectID == 7318) { // Portal to yanille resetPos(); teleportToX = 2605; teleportToY = 3092; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("Welcome Back To Yanille"); break;

CLICK = NOTHING!!!

Why won’t it work??? It compiles, do I have to add somethign extra to make it work?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 15, 2008, 01:04:28 AM[/size][hr]UPDATE!!!

Guys I figured it out…

You also need to add it to the objects.cfg

Read full topic
item.source: Why won't portals work on dodian?
